function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of nature-based solutions in urban areas","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity, ecosystem services, and urban sustainability","Mitigation":"Develop policies and incentives to encourage the implementation of green infrastructure","Technologies":"Nature-based solutions, green roofs, green walls","People":"Municipalities, urban planners, private investors","Owner":"Municipalities, private investors"},{"Description":"Impact of economic crisis resulting from COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Minimization of private investment in nature-based solutions","Mitigation":"Launch monetary incentives to promote private investment in nature-based solutions","Technologies":"Monetary incentives, green roofs, green walls","People":"Private investors","Owner":"Government, organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and support for green roof implementation","Impact":"Missed environmental, social, and economic benefits of green roofs","Mitigation":"Raise awareness and provide support for green roof implementation","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, training programs, financial support","People":"Building owners, urban planners, community members","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
